briefTitle: 6-Month Extension Trial of Asenapine With Olanzapine in Negative Symptoms Patients Who Completed the First 6- Month Trial (A7501014)(COMPLETED)(P05772)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Double-Blind, Flexible-Dose, 6-Month Extension Trial Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of Asenapine With Olanzapine in Subjects Who Completed Protocol A7501013
summary:
This is an extension study of A7501013 (P05771/NCT00145496) to further test

the efficacy and safety of Asenapine compared with a

marketed agent (olanzapine) in the treatment of patients with

persistent negative symptoms of schizophrenia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Negative Symptoms of Schizophrenia Measured by the Negative Symptom Assessment (NSA) Scale Total Score
